q: Donald Rumsfeld was particularly critical of Director of National Intelligence James Clapper 's description of the Muslim Brootherhood as a "largely secular" during a House Intelligence Committee testimony Thursday that James Clapper 's office later had to clarify. That is not something that is subject to debate, Donald Rumsfeld said of James Clapper 's contention. "That is something that we know a great deal about." Bernie Sanders discovered that a number of products sold in the gift shop were not made America, but produced in other countries. I find it especially disappointing that miniature sculptures of presidents George Washington that are sold in the museum, including George Washington , Thomas Jefferson , and Barack Obama were made in China, Sen. The title derives from a frequently parodied Donald Rumsfeld response to a reporter's question about whether there actually was evidence of any link between Saddam Hussein and terrorists seeking weapons of mass destruction. The Defense secretary responded: Reports that say that something hasn't happened are always interesting to me because, as we know, there are known knowns; there are things we know we know. We also know there are known unknowns; that is to say we know there are some things we do not know. But there are also unknown unknowns- the ones we don't know we don't know. Preston Gralla hebben nerds aan de macht geen zin. " Steve Ballmer kan de meest briljante ontwikkelaars onder hem hebben, maar het draait om een visie voor de toekomst." Dean Takahasi van Venturebeat stelt het nog scherper: Op een gegeven moment kan Steve Ballmer niet meer de schuld op mensen binnen de organisatie schuiven en moet hij zelf de verantwoordelijkheid nemen. Dat hebben we eerder gezien bij Nokia en AMD. De kans lijkt klein dat met het aanstellen van nieuwe topmanagers de aandeelhouders direct tevreden gesteld worden. "Het kan wel de druk op Steve Ballmer wegnemen, maar alleen als het op korte termijn resultaat oplevert"

"Nokia e Microsoft- spiega ancora l'azienda- collaboreranno anche su iniziative di marketing e condivideranno la roadmap per lo sviluppo dei telefoni cellulari". Oggi- ha detto il presidente e Ceo di Nokia, Stephen Elop - sviluppatori, operatori e consumatori vogliono telefoni cellulari irresistibili, che non siano soltanto un apparecchio telefonico, ma che abbiano software, servizi, applicazioni e supporto ai clienti che facciano di un telefono una grande esperienza. Nokia e Microsoft uniranno le loro forze per consegnare un prodotto senza rivali.
